import { Component, OnInit } from "@angular/core"; @Component({ selector: "app-about-me", templateUrl: "./about-me.component.html", styleUrls: ["./about-me.component.scss"], }) export class AboutMeComponent implements OnInit { constructor() {} ngOnInit(): void {} openCV(): void { window.open( "https://chopyk89.github.io/portfolio/assets/CV_Chopyk.pdf", "_blank", "fullscreen=yes" ); } }

About Me

Full Name: Email: Address Career start day:
Chopyk Viacheslav if040489cvv@gmail.com Ukraine, Ivano - Frankivsk 07.11.2021

Hello There!

Front End Web Developer with 2 years of commercial experience in software development using Angular Framework. Familiarized with cross-device responsive web development. Result-orientated, responsible and attention to detail.

Technical Skills
